ARABIC: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mention Ibrahim in the Book. He was a true man and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Commemorate Abraham in the Book: He was upright, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), recite in the Book the account of Abraham. Most surely he was a man of truth, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Mention the story of Abraham, the truthful Prophet, in the Book (the Quran)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Ibrahim in the Book; he was very truthful, a Herald of the Hidden (a Prophet).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And mention in the Book, Ibrahim. Verily, he was a man of truth, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And mention Ibrahim in the Book; surely he was a truthful man, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And mention in the Book Abraham; surely he was a true man, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And make mention (O Muhammad) in the Scripture of Abraham. Lo! he was a saint, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Also recount the story of Abraham in the Book. He was a man of truth, and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And mention thou in the Book Ibrahim; verily he was a man of truth, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And mention in the Book Abraham. Indeed, he was a truthful man and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Also mention in the Book (the story of) Abraham: He was a man of Truth, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And mention in the Book (the Quran) Ibrahim (Abraham). Verily! He was a man of truth, a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Mention in the Book Abraham; He was truthful and a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention in the Scripture Abraham. He was a man of truth, a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:41] And mention, to them, in the Book Abraham, that is, [mention] his tale. Indeed he was a truthful one ([the intensive form siddīq] means ‘extremely truthful’), a prophet (the following [statement] substitutes for the [preceding] predicate).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And make mention (0 Muhammad) in the Scripture of Abraham) the event of Abraham. (Lo! he was a saint) he believed in faith, (a prophet) sent to people, informing them on behalf of his Lord.
